Improvements.Improvement: Use Logger instead of System.out and System.err
Improvements.Description: Use of System.out and System.err for logging messages is not recommended. It is better to use a logging API such as java.util.logging, log4j, etc. This will provide flexibility in distributing log messages to multiple output targets, as well as formatting messages.
